function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Policies not uniformly applied across administrative units","Impact":"Inconsistent application of policies may lead to uneven disease spread and varying levels of protection","Mitigation":"Develop standardized guidelines for policy implementation and strict monitoring of compliance","Technologies":"Monitoring and tracking systems, automation of policy implementation","People":"Population within administrative units, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, policymakers"},{"Description":"Fractional application of policies within administrative units","Impact":"Unequal protection within administrative units may lead to pockets of infection and inconsistent control measures","Mitigation":"Adjust policy weighting based on population density and infection rates within each administrative unit","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling, geographic information systems (GIS)","People":"Population within administrative units, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, policymakers"}]}
